about_the_game:
Don't forget to wishlist and follow!

EXPLORATION

Embark on a journey through a beautiful and tranquil forest, full of secrets and breathtaking landscapes waiting to be discovered. Uncover the mysteries lying beneath the tree canopy as you search for valuable resources to aid in your survival.

BUILDING AND DECORATION

Become one with nature by constructing and customizing your own cabin from scratch. Use your creativity to decorate it with handmade furniture and unique items, transforming it into your cozy sanctuary amidst the towering trees.

COOKING

Make the most of nature's abundance as you learn to prepare delicious meals using a variety of plants and vegetables found throughout the forest. Experiment with different recipes and flavors to satisfy your hunger. Don't forget to document your culinary discoveries in your trusty field notebook!

ANIMAL HUSBANDRY

Immerse yourself in the rhythm of nature with activities like fishing, beekeeping, and caring for your own chickens and sheep. Cultivate a harmonious relationship with the wildlife around you, embracing the peaceful coexistence that defines life beneath the tree canopy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, German, Spanish - Latin America
